subject: MockEJB with IntelliJ to test my EJB's
msgSnippet: Hi Guys, I am using MockEJB with IntelliJ 3.0.4 to test my EJB s. I have a problem in creating a MockContainer object, which throws in error as follows Can
messageBody:
Hi Guys,
I am using MockEJB with IntelliJ 3.0.4 to test my EJB's.

I have a problem in creating a MockContainer object, which throws in error
as follows
Can anyone tell me where am I going wrong?
I am attaching the classes for your Reference.

testfindPromotionDetailXML(com.triversity.transactionware.promotion.Promotio

:29)
